item.title: キャメルケースからスネークケースに変換
item.description: // CamelCaseName => camel_case_name toSnakCase(name){ return name.replace(/(?:^|\.?)([A-Z])/g, function (x,y){return "_" + y.toLowerCase()}).replace(/^_/, ""); } string - Javascript convert PascalCase to underscore_case - Stack Overflow
